website_summaries.verdict: Looks and runs like a high-end model. Hands-down the best choice if you want a well-made fan for a budget price.
pros: Quality features and functions for a fraction of the price of other models
Attractive style, superb airflow, easy installation, quiet operation
cons: No remote or light, but you can buy these extras with what you save
A bit wobbly at highest speed, but this doesn't affect performance or quality

customer_reviews.title: Contemporary sleek no noise fan.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing hunter fan we have ever bought. At first I thought the three blade fan would not put out enough air but I was certainly proven wrong. It is very quiet and it is one of the few fans that do not have a remote control. We have enough remote controls and we certainly don’t need one for a fan. It’s also quite attractive and contemporary and goes well with our furnishings. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MargR

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer needs a lesson in quality control and customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality control and even worse customer service. I purchased two fans. I had to supplement wiring due to missing ground wire on one fan. The second fan had a bit lodged in a bolt hole and had to be shipped back to the manufacturer. I made a call to customer service and opted for a call back instead of waiting the 20 stated wait time. It took 2.5 hours to get a return call. I tried the online route for the second fan issue and had received a replacement from Amazon and had it installed before I heard back from the manufacturer. The fans work great now but not worth the aggravation.
customer_reviews.author: Dan S

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: Installed 2 of these on our front porch. Going for that Savanna Georgia or the porches in the Hamptons look ha ha. Only downer is, no remote control. They are built for indoor or covered outdoor use. Blades are a nice dark gray color. Fan is the 3 speed model. No light package available for this model. Definately great on those hot-humid days.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best Outdoor fan I've used
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these and used them out in my patio structure. They give off plenty of air as we have tested them well over the last month with all the heat and humidity we have had here in SC. They are well made and easy to install
customer_reviews.author: fxrsniper

customer_reviews.title: Modern, clean lines, simple & perfect shade of gray
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT!! EXACTLY WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOR 🤗🤗 No damages and it works perfectly. I’m very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very wobbly
customer_reviews.text: I went back and checked my work multiple times. Even put the little weight on each blade and tried to balance. No luck. This one is a wobbler. Really like the look and the price, but I can't set it on high without risk of decapitation.
customer_reviews.author: R. B.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and seems well made. Wish it moved just a little more air
customer_reviews.text: Over all very happy. Wish it moved just a little more air.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Such a reasonable price for an pretty outdoor fan!
customer_reviews.text: I have two on my patio and they move the air just enough. You don't feel like you're in a wind tunnel, but you can definitely feel air movement. If you want lights on your fan, this is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Marvella Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Nice fan. Been looking for one that looked great without paying with my right leg. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: InTheHeartofTexas

customer_reviews.title: Get the whole story
customer_reviews.text: If you're hanging this on the patio and your ceiling is more than 10 feet high, you'll need a 24 inch outdoor downrod. Retail price $99 from Hunter. So the $129 fan won't do the job unless you spend another $99 to make the proper installation.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Wiggly!
customer_reviews.text: The fan wiggles and cause a vibration throughout the patio.
customer_reviews.author: Slap

customer_reviews.title: Does good job keeping garage floor dry in winter months
customer_reviews.text: Installed in my finished garage, Works well, only wish it would push more air around in the summer months. Does good job keeping garage floor dry in winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B.

customer_reviews.title: Great fan. Good air circulation. Quiet. Reversible blades (silver/black). Great instructions. Well packaged.
customer_reviews.text: Love the fan. Good air circulation. Love the fact that the blades are reversible (silver/black). Very functional and easy to install. Great instructions. I was missing a couple of screws, but I had replacements on-hand.
customer_reviews.author: Code Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Classy design, works well
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we expected. Nice quiet fans that look great on our back porch. Not every fan can handle Florida's humidity, but these are doing very well.
customer_reviews.author: W&C McCann

customer_reviews.title: Good fan for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great fan for in the garage. Good air flow. Quiet. Easy to install. I did the install instructions a little out of order. Put blades on before hanging from ceiling. Seemed like more work If I had to install blades while on a ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible air flow and quit working after just two months of intermittant use
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these fans. One stopped working completely after just 2 months. They have no airflow. I would never buy these fans. Terrible. Also missed my return window and now I don't get any money back for the defective one.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Grunnah

customer_reviews.title: Hunter has gone down the tubes
customer_reviews.text: What a cheap fan! This is not the quality of fan I expected for Hunter. The fan is really cheap and was missing all the screws to install the switch housing on the bottom of the motor. After spending 20 min waiting for customer support to “help” I decided go to Home Depot and purchase the needed screws.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great patio fans
customer_reviews.text: I used these outside for my patio and so far I love them. No problems as of yet (they have been installed for about 3 months).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product if you luck out and get a good one.
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these. The first one I installed was perfect - no noise, no wobbling. The second one both wobbled and made an annoying humming noise at medium and high speeds, and the third one was missing the entire base section. It seems quality control is definitely hit-or-miss. Thankfully Amazon was understanding as always and replaced the bad ones, which is the reason I gave this product three stars instead of two. To Hunter: Hopefully this is a limited experience but your QC on packaging and fan motor quality might need some attention.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Higher quality than expected for the price. Easy install with good instructions for DYI. Put 2 on my front porch. Only complaint is they do not generate as much airflow as I was hoping for. I operate both on high and it only creates a gentle breeze, but I have a large porch with 9ft ceilings. The fans are very quite and the finish is attractive. Overall would recommend and/or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary B.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: had to go thru hunter. amazon sent me a beat up used scratched bent broken fan
customer_reviews.author: suz

customer_reviews.title: Great fan for a covered deck !
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my daughter's new deck I built for her. As always for Hunter products - excellent quality and build - it will last her for years !
customer_reviews.author: Missouri Guy

customer_reviews.title: Big Fan of This Fan
customer_reviews.text: Well worth it for a garage... very cool literally... and looks good too. Highly recommend...
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy V.

customer_reviews.title: ATTRACTIVE; LIGHT WEIGHT; QUIET, AND OPERATED WITH ...
customer_reviews.text: ATTRACTIVE ; LIGHT WEIGHT; QUIET, AND OPERATED WITH SIMPLE CHAIN CONTROL.
customer_reviews.author: Frank M. Buselli

customer_reviews.title: Not strong does not feel air at all
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 fans for our porch because they were the color and look we were looking for but as soon as my husband installed them we did not feel any air ..it does not move air this fans are worthless what a waste of money very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t have the power you would think
customer_reviews.text: We bought this one with hopes to move air on the outdoor patio we’ve built but it didn’t move the air like we were hoping.
customer_reviews.author: Kodee Roraback

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Look great on our outdoor porch. Easy enough to install. Great output.
customer_reviews.author: luanne demore

customer_reviews.title: Recommend Hunter.
customer_reviews.text: Used 2 of these on our back porch. Quiet and nice style.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Price

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Put these on our back porch. Love the industrial look and they were easy to put up! Very quiet
customer_reviews.author: TR Turner

customer_reviews.title: Decent fan.
customer_reviews.text: Nice fan for the money. Wobbles more than I think it should, though.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Wells

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love how you can have the blades look silver or dark brown, they are reversible
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fan
customer_reviews.text: Great fan for the price. Quiet , hooked them up to a wall switch no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Zion

customer_reviews.title: Works great. I've gotten plenty of complements on it in ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I've gotten plenty of complements on it in my covered porch. I plan to purchase two more to complete the project.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Bates

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fans! Placed two in garage and 1 on back porch. They move air well!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Rutherford- Dayie

customer_reviews.title: Needs more speeds.
customer_reviews.text: Finish nice and assembly. However, the fan does not push a lot of air. Seems like the rpm's are a lot lower than the fans inside my home.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Great for Our Needs
customer_reviews.text: Great fan for our outside patio. A cool, modern look that blends with many different looks. We used it on our colonial style home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Although this fan is a great price and can be used outside
customer_reviews.text: Although this fan is a great price and can be used outside, it doesn't move a whole lot of air on our porch. Didn't have it installed until after the window of returning the item closed, so I'm stuck with 2 of them. :(
customer_reviews.author: Keli Lydell

customer_reviews.title: Nice clean design
customer_reviews.text: we bought multiple fans for our bedrooms. Nice clean design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a great outdoor fan. Easy to assemble and heavy duty materials.
customer_reviews.author: Sean W Peacock

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Quit working after 2 years. I expect more than 2 years out of a ceiling fan, much less a Hunter.
customer_reviews.author: KZ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fan for the patio! Wish it was just a little bigger
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice large blades keep the garage cool
customer_reviews.text: Nice for the price. Hung these in the garage and it keeps it cool!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in good condition. We tested the motor and it runs ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good condition. We tested the motor and it runs on all settings. We haven't installed it yet, but I'm expecting all to go well since the motor is running. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and moves a lot of air for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy install and moves a lot of air for my 14' ceiling. Installed 2 side by side in the garage and no issues at all with 12' separation.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Carr

customer_reviews.title: Looks fantastic, works just okay
customer_reviews.text: Not a very strong fan, I have 3 on our patio and unless you're directly under it, there's not much air movement. It helps when there's zero breeze, but not much added to the patio if there's a light breeze over 5-7mph. This is the second brand I've bought for the patio, and while this one is much better than the first (a Hampton Bay fan, same price point), I'm still a bit disappointed with the output.
customer_reviews.author: Flyin'Hawaiian

customer_reviews.title: You don't get what you pay for with this one!
customer_reviews.text: Pitiful product. Rated as an outdoor fan but has wooden blades. Don't see them lasting a year before warping. Can't feel a breeze from it unless you stand directly under it. I would not recommend this fan to anyone. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much that I bought another.
customer_reviews.text: Liked it so much that I bought another. I put one of these in my bedroom and one in my living room. They are sleek, quite, and exactly what I was looking for. Easy to put together and includes everything you need.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, minimalist design
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to put on my back patio during a minor outdoor remodel. We took the original, single ceiling fan junction box and made into a can light along with two new cans and then added two of these ceiling fans. They are controlled with a pull chain so we added a single kill switch outside for both fans. They look gorgeous and are almost flush mount which was my intention as I always hated the previous fan with it dangling (and ugly) light kit. Love the industrial, modern look to them. Very quiet and very well balanced.
customer_reviews.author: swt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Easy to install and looks great. Very minimalist and clean design. Quiet and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: carole

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great fan!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and whisper quiet. Love it's industrial look on our rustic cedar screened in porch. Really moves the air and keeps the room so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Paulette K

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and scratched out of the box
customer_reviews.text: This fan was covered in knicks and scratches right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Saul

customer_reviews.title: Too much flat, grey finish. Not the industrial chic I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Great fan but it really has an "industrial" look. I thought it would look more modern chic, but it has a really flat, grey finish that doesn't look all that great.
customer_reviews.author: Warren S.

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 fans and 1 came without cap. Seller/Amazon did send the missing cap, however the fan literally has no air movement at all standing anywhere in the room. My contractor helped pick this fan because it matches the modern look of our house which does look great but that's about it. I now have 4 rooms with totally worthless fans, HUGE DISAPPOINTMENT!!! DON'T BUY THUS FAN unless you just want the fan for looks. Oh, I did purchase remote in case someone is thinking to install with a remote and does work with the fan but again fan is just useless itself.
customer_reviews.author: FL

customer_reviews.title: Need to return them
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for a client in a construction project. Client did not like them. Need to return them.
customer_reviews.author: 3Pete9

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Worked well. One quit after 2 days and the company sent me a new one in less that 4 days and did not have me send the old one back. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Chester A. Sienko Jr.

product_meta.title: Hunter Fan Company Hunter 59262 Contemporary Modern 52'' Ceiling Fan from Cassius collection in Pwt, Nckl, B/S, Slvr. finish, Matte Silver
product_meta.description: Size:52"| Color:Matte SilverContemporary Modern 52``Ceiling Fan from Cassius collection in Matte Silver finish. Appropriate for ceiling heights of 8 foot and greater.
feature_bullets: Whisper wind motor delivers ultra powerful air movement with whisper quiet performance so you get the cooling power you want without the noise you don't
Reversible motor allows you to change the direction of your fan from downdraft mode during the summer to updraft mode during the winter
3 matte silver / black willow reversible blades included
13 degree blade pitch optimized to ensure ideal air movement and peak performance
5 inches and 3 inches downrods included to ensure proper distance from the ceiling and optimize air movement at your preferred blade height
ETL damp rated for use in covered porches, patios and sunrooms; features stainless steel hardware to resist rust
Installer's choice 3 position mounting system allows for standard, low or angled mounting
Included pull chain allows for quick and easy on/off and speed adjustments

specifications.Usage: ETL Damp-rated for use in covered porches, patios and sunrooms
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars733 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
